metadata.title: CVE-2023-41359 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0. There is anout-of-bounds read in bgp_attr_aigp_valid in bgpd/bgp_attr.c because thereis no check for the availability of two bytes during AIGP validation.

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
